name: 林淑玲
objective:
闡述財務管理中重要的投資、融資與長短期資金管理決策之基本架構，結合資訊工具、財務軟體及財金資料庫，以深入淺出方式介紹財務管理之基本觀念及理論架構。配合各項相關議題進行財金個案研討，結合財務管理實務並融入財務決策研討，培養理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之學習，培育學生具備財務管理的學科知識與專業技術整合能力、判斷性思考與決策能力以及解決財務管理問題之能力。
It explains the basic structure of investment, financing and long-term and short-term fund management decisions that are important in financial management. It combines information tools, financial software and financial databases to introduce the basic concepts and theoretical structure of financial management in a simple and easy-to-understand way. Conduct financial case studies in conjunction with various related topics, integrate financial management practices into financial decision-making discussions, and cultivate financial management talents with both theory and practice. Through the study of this course, students can develop the ability to integrate subject knowledge and professional skills in financial management, critical thinking and decision-making skills, and the ability to solve financial management problems.
schedule:
週次	 課    程   內   容
一	 財務管理的範圍
二	 公司目標 & 股價決定因素
三	 代理問題
四	 金融市場與機構 & 市場效率性
五	 認識財務報表 & 自由現金流量分析
六	 財務報表分析與應用
